global_attributes.comment: Deployment Summary: This glider was initially deployed 1/31/2021 for D00012 but spent a significant portion of the deployment off of the EB line due to being stuck in a Gulf Stream warm core ring. It was recovered 3/30/2021 and re-deployed back on the EB line 4/2/2021 for D00013. The glider was again swept into the WCR and recovered 4/16/2021.

platform.long_name: OOI Coastal Pioneer 200m Slocum Glider cp_339
